[id='connecting-to-http_{context}']
= Connecting to HTTP and HTTPS endpoints
:context: http

In an integration, you can connect to HTTP and HTTPS endpoints to execute
the `GET`, `PUT`, `POST`, `DELETE`, `HEAD`, `OPTIONS`, `TRACE`, 
or `PATCH` method. To do this, create 
an HTTP or HTTPS connection and then add it to an integration flow. 
The following topics provide details:

* xref:creating-http-connections_{context}[]
* xref:adding-http-connections_{context}[]

include::../../modules/connecting/p_creating-http-connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/connecting/p_adding-http-connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

:context: connectors
